titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation requiring the members of both Houses of Parliament to give their attendance upon the fifteenth day of January next
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb and Henry Hills ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the 7th day of December, 1677, in the nine and twentieth year of our reign."
Imperfect: cropped with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
